name: The Room (itch) (ethanthopkins)
description:
You don't remember how you got to this room. All you know now is that the walls are closing in and you can't see a thing...

My first game in unity. Just a simple walking sim with some creepy ambience. Hope you enjoy :)]

Made for Fear Jam 2

I used the wall sound effect from kwandalist.

I used the ambience from Natureworld1986.

I used ambience from RPG Ambient Sounds.
